## LimitedRowSelectorOptions interface

Limited row selector options

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface LimitedRowSelectorOptions<TSelectedData = any, TData = any, TId = any> extends RowSelectorOptions<TSelectedData, TData, TId> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [limit](./grid.limitedrowselectoroptions.limit.md) | <code>number</code> | Count of items that can be selected |
